title.narrative: First instalment of Comic Relief Firestarter grant

description.narrative: This grant will be the first instalment relating to the Firestarter project, which aims to identify organisations which have the potential to upskill and empower youth to seek employment and to help them strengthen their management practices, processes, and capacity so that they can support more youth in the future to find jobs. Sensi will deliver this through the provision of small grants, physical and virtual spaces for collaboration, training in organization development and for individual staff members and access to technology resources and equipment, and mentorship.

Supporting Youth Employment/Entrepreneurship Through Sensi Tech Hub’ and the description can be: ‘This funding has been made available to us via the Queen’s Young Leaders Programme and will enable Sensi tech innovation hub in Sierra Leone to support initiatives which help upskill young people to enable them to gain employment or participate in entrepreneurship.’ (see originalpurpose below in Notes Section).

Supporting Youth Employment/Entrepreneurship Through Sensi Tech Hub’ and the description can be: ‘This funding has been made available to us via the Queen’s Young Leaders Programme and will enable Sensi tech innovation hub in Sierra Leone to support initiatives which help upskill young people to enable them to gain employment or participate in entrepreneurship.’ (see originalpurpose below in Notes Section).

This grant will be the first instalment relating to the Firestarter project, which aims to identify organisations which have the potential to upskill and empower youth to seek employment and to help them strengthen their management practices, processes, and capacity so that they can support more youth in the future to find jobs. Sensi will deliver this through the provision of small grants, physical and virtual spaces for collaboration, training in organization development and for individual staff members and access to technology resources and equipment, and mentorship.
